channel.title: Red Crucible 2 (Browser or Standalone)
channel.description:
I'm looking for someone to play with. I am fairly experienced with the game. Have my own clan (recently started for 2,000 Honor Points) called NMC (No Mercy Clan). I usually play TDM or host my own server. Let me know if you wanna play or join my clan! We can talk through TS or Skype or something.
I have a K/D of 1.96 Longest killstreak - 22 70 Wins 53 Losses.
Anyways RC2 is a game similar to Battlefield. There are vehicles or you can play infantry mode (no vehicles) which is what I usually do. You can play the game through your browser or there is a client download hidden in there code. (I found it lol ;) )
BROWSER - http://www.rocketeergames.com/redcrucible.html STANDALONE - http://www.rocketeergames.com/redcrucible/standalone.zip
Here is a little gameplay of me: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DmEGZEwXMI[/youtube]

item.title: Red Crucible 2 (Browser or Standalone)
item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

Sweet. Ill send you an invite, what will/is your gamertag? Mine is sgtAline

Read full topic
